metadata.description: Arizona's majestic Micro.Spy collective, including Tek, who produced one of the classic early m211 mp3 tracks in "Benedict", come right back at us with "Flimflam", and boy, does this one kick up a storm? Just listen to the wicked breakbeat style - this is the kind of release mono211 would like to think would characterise its style, going forward - that and the natty Squarepusher-ish jazz-jam, which you'll see a lot of in forthcoming releases.. cool!
metadata.title: Micro.Spy - Flimflam [mtw014]
metadata.subject: Electronic
